alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Interior Seward Peninsula; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 11 at 4:51AM AKST until November 13 at 4:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible, locally up to 12 inches north and east of Nome. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph in the Bering Strait. * WHERE...Bering Strait Coast, Southern Seward Peninsula Coast, Interior Seward Peninsula and Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation possible over the Yukon Delta with light glaze of ice accumulation possible on Sunday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Interior Seward Peninsula; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast
